vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.message:
StandardToken.decimals should be constant (MintedCrowdsale.sol#356)
StandardToken.name should be constant (MintedCrowdsale.sol#354)
StandardToken.symbol should be constant (MintedCrowdsale.sol#355)
